description.action: Evan stands in the center of the courtyard, his arms raised in celebration as he leads the other children in saying their goodbyes.
Isaac bounces and hops around, his koala-like movements reflecting his excitement as he promises the other children that he'll return soon for another adventure.
Aaron stomps and roars, his dinosaur-like behavior adding to the energy of the children's farewells as they transform back into their animal forms one last time.
Aurelia giggles and claps her hands, her panda-like mannerisms conveying a sense of joy and excitement as the children prepare to depart, eager to return soon for another adventure.
